FuncDef:
The snmp-agent sys-info version command enables the corresponding SNMP version.
The snmp-agent sys-info version disable command disables the corresponding SNMP version. The snmp-agent sys-info version command enables the corresponding SNMP version. The snmp-agent sys-info version disable command disables the corresponding SNMP version. By default, the version is SNMPv3.

ParaDef.Info:
Enables all SNMP versions, namely, SNMPv1, SNMPv2c, and SNMPv3.
all

ExtraInfo:
To set an SNMP version, run the snmp-agent sys-info version command. SNMP functions provided vary with the SNMP version.
SNMPv1:
